experience.name: Bonasys IT Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
experience.title: Data Science Intern
description: Built a sentiment analysis model using Logistic Regression and XGBoost to classify restaurant reviews with high accuracy.
Conducted extensive data cleaning and visualization using Python, Pandas, and Matplotlib to extract meaningful insights from unstructured feedback.
Developed and deployed a full ML pipeline integrated with a web-based GUI for real-time sentiment prediction.
Delivered data-driven recommendations to enhance restaurant service quality based on customer sentiment trends.
